column4: My monitor can't go above 1360x768 I think it was, I need to go up to 1600x1200, is there an easy way to add the res?
wtf, is it the hardest thing in the world to add resolutions to monitors?

for most of my nvidia based systems - they wont go to the proper/max res - untill i get the nvidia drivers installed properly. I also find that with DVI monitor/connections  they rarely give me res problems.
Hmm.. Never noticed a way to do that..    It may depend on the app and how well its supports different sound settings it might be doable
